person.persName: Adron Morgan (Clay County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier.)

body.p: Clay County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Mary "Polly" Nance Morgan. Father of Madison Morgan, Josephine Morgan, Jemima Morgan, Jerrusa Morgan, Joseph Morgan, Samuel Morgan, and Stephen Morgan. Farmer in Owsley County, Kentucky, in 1860. Resident of Clay County in 1861. Farmer in Clay County in 1863. Served in the 47th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private and sergeant from October 5, 1863, to December 26, 1864.
